comment: Now I have PhD in International Relations. But back in 2003 at Mississippi State University, it was Dr. Abdulfattah Damien Yaghi who encouraged and supported me to pursue grad studies; he kept pushing me to work harder because he believed in me as he told me: you will be a great professor one day. I cannot forget those words.

Oh man. After over ten years since I finished my MPA, I can say that professor Abdulfattah Yaghi was a great teacher. Now I realize more than before the value of his indepth analysis of HRM and the politics behind it and how organizations really operate and treat employees. I am the director of operations and I often remember Dr. Yaghi's advices
Great professor. He was very helpful and cared about students' future.

I took the global public administration because I heard a lot of good things about professor Yaghi. I found the class and Dr. Yaghi great.Unfortunately Dr Yaghi is leaving KSU... I will miss him a lot.. he helped me every time I asked for his help and I feel I benefited a lot from this course.
I love this professor...he is so helpful. I like his online PAD 7900 Global Public Adminsitration class..I enjoyed the readings and essay writing
Dr Yaghi is just great..I finished this HRM class with him and he was even greater than what my friend has told me..he was so comprehensive in teaching and very prompt in grading

Online Class was hardly demanding, 3 papers and that's it.  The assignments for the papers are pretty broad, but if you cover what is in the book you should score quite well.  Excellent class, would take over and over again

Human resources class is very interesting. The time was long during the summer but the discussions and lectures were great. This is my second class with dr, Damien Yaghi. I think he is very fair and knowledgeable.
I took this class online and I loved it. Everything came from the book. We used exercises and assignments that were very practical. Dr. Yaghi was prompt and helpful

It is amazing that this man receives a paycheck! He is incredibly nice but absolutely useless as an instructor. His classes are very easy-straight from the text. However, his grading system is a bit screwy! Total point for the class were only 100. Not much room for error.

Great professor. He truly cares about students’ future. Many formats for exams and evaluation. Dr. Damien really knows what he is talking about. He gives take-home exams, essays, and stress-free tests. Many case studies and class discussion. Gives study guide. I got an “A” ... but studied a lot. It's a fun class and professional environment.

Absolutely wonderful! He is so nice, thoughtful, helpful, and the class seems so easy becuase he presents the information so well. He is my favorite professor. He is always willing to help his students.
Damien knows the material. He gave us a project and a loooooooot of work. He helped my many times. I like his teaching style..very laidback

He is fair. Just show up for classes, do your homework and have fun. Exams are not so hard. However there will be homework and a lot of discussions. He is an excellent teacher and will go out of his way to help his students.
